body_html:
Replacing the line grad_input[torch.mul(torch.eq(target, -1), torch.gt(input, ctx.margin))] = 0
with grad_input[torch.mul(torch.eq(target, -1).unsqueeze(1), torch.gt(input, ctx.margin))] = 0
in torch/nn/_functions/loss.py fixes the error mentioned in kevinzakka's edit above.

body:
Replacing the line grad_input[torch.mul(torch.eq(target, -1), torch.gt(input, ctx.margin))] = 0
with grad_input[torch.mul(torch.eq(target, -1).unsqueeze(1), torch.gt(input, ctx.margin))] = 0
in torch/nn/_functions/loss.py fixes the error mentioned in kevinzakka's edit above.
